channel.title: Python code auto formatter
channel.description:
Python code formatter that complies with standards and suppresses build prompts complaining about it:
https://packages.debian.org/buster/black
Successor project:
https://github.com/venthur/noir
More info:
https://blog.venthur.de/2019-08-introducing-noir.html
Could be handy for the few Python packages we have.

item.title: Python code auto formatter
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Python code formatter that complies with standards and suppresses build prompts complaining about it:

https://packages.debian.org/buster/black

Successor project:

GitHub

venthur/noir

The uncompromising Python code formatter. Contribute to venthur/noir development by creating an account on GitHub.

More info:

https://blog.venthur.de/2019-08-introducing-noir.html

Could be handy for the few Python packages we have.
